dict.acceptation: 获胜的人；胜券在握；制胜的一记入球；成功的东西；

sent.orig: But tonight there are only be one winner and the field test winner is Kosomo.
sent.trans: 我为你们每个人感到骄傲。

sent.orig: But the winner in a domestic argument is never really the winner.
sent.trans: 其实家庭内争吵的赢家永远不可能是真正的赢家。

sent.orig: He presented a silver cup to the winner [presented the winner with a silver cup].
When you have a winner, stick with your winner.
sent.trans: 如果你有了一个赢家，跟赢家在一起吧。

sent.orig: A surprise winner. President Obama gets the Nobel Peace Prize. Many ask why.
sent.trans: 奥巴马总统意外获得诺贝尔和平奖，引起各方质疑。
